About the Editor

Are you planning to buy best outdoor Bluetooth speakers 2020? Here You’ve
arrived on the right webpage. We spent 44 hours on research, testing, and
editing, to review the top choices for the top 10 best rugged, waterproof
wireless Bluetooth speakers. Now we are going to introduce and review the top
10 best outdoor Bluetooth speakers that we have researched and tested.

 _ **…It’s Not That Easy To Buy Best Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers These Days…**_

Presently, there are more than a million of **bluetooth speaker for outdoor
party** products are available on the market.

No doubt, the competition has inspired innovation, but it has also made things
quite complicated for the user to buy the **best** **rugged,** **waterproof**
**wireless** **Bluetooth speakers**. The truth is, you can’t test all the
available options before buying to choose the one that worth your money. Lucky
for you, we have listened and tested most of the reputed Bluetooth speaker
brands, and in this post, we are going to expose everything about them so that
you can make a healthy investment.

We know that it’s necessary that you get familiar with some essential factors
and aspects of **best waterproof** **wireless speakers**. So, we have added
the best outdoor Bluetooth speakers buying guide at the bottom of this post.
So, read on the BlueTooth speakers buying guide section to get familiar with
everything before buying the one.

So, that’s all with the jargons. Let’s now starting the top 10 best outdoor
bluetooth speakers reviews list and the buying guide.

###  **#10. OontZ Angle 3**

The first **best outdoor portable Bluetooth speaker** on our list at rank #10
is **OontZ Angle 3**. It’s one of the best inexpensive portable Bluetooth
speakers with excellent sound quality and portability. It offers HQ crystal
clear sound with distinct mids and highs from its two precision acoustic
drivers excellent stereo and powerful bass.

Also, the **OontZ Angle 3 outdoor Bluetooth speaker** features a proprietary
passive subwoofer design that works to add punch in bass and result in louder
volume. Thanks to its Volume Booster 10+ watt power AMP, it offers a very loud
sound with no distortion.

Another impressive fact about **OontZ Angle 3** is its 100-foot Bluetooth
range. Well, the battery life that you get with this Bluetooth speaker is only
7 hours of continuous music play. All in all, OontZ Angle 3 is one of the best
buy outdoor Bluetooth speakers to buy today!

###  **#9. JBL Flip 4**

JBL Flip 4 is a small, portable, durable, and dependable Bluetooth speaker
with excellent sound quality and features. Of course, no one can beat JBL for
accessible and affordable audio, especially when it comes to wireless speaker
technology. **JBL Flip 4** is a substantial upgrade to an already robust line
of speakers from JBL.

Furthermore, **JBL Flip 4 outdoor Bluetooth speaker** comes packed with a
3,000 mAh battery, and that offers up to 12 hours of music playtime. Also, it
comes with an IPX7 waterproof rating, and that means you can even submerge it
in water without worry about anything.

What’s more? **JBL Flip 4** is equipped with dual external passive radiators
offering very loud, clear, and powerful sound. Also, it comes with a year
warranty to ensure the buyer’s sound investment. Overall, it’s another **best
outdoor portable Bluetooth speaker** on our list that you can buy without
overthinking about anything.

###  **#8. Oraolo Portable Bluetooth Speakers**

Looking for portable outdoor Bluetooth speakers with durable construction? If
yes, then Oraolo Portable Bluetooth Speakers is definitely made for you. One
of the best things about this Bluetooth speaker is its durable construction
and 20 hours of excellent playtime. Yes, Oraolo Portable Bluetooth Speakers
comes packed with a 4,000 mAh Li-ion battery, which offers up to 20 hours of
music playback.

Furthermore, thanks to the 2x12W dual stereo speaker configuration, this
Bluetooth speaker provides a loud stereo sound. Also, it has a powerful stereo
and passive subwoofers that amplifies the lower bass frequencies.

What’s more? The Bluetooth speaker also packs unique loudspeaker cavity
structure and noise/wind cancellation technology to provide you with premium
acoustic sound at the party, beach, pool, camping, gym and almost everywhere.
It’s very portable to carry around. All in all, it’s one of the best outdoor
Bluetooth speakers that you will not regret buying.

###  **#7. Ultimate Ears MEGABOOM 3**

The next product in our portable outdoor Bluetooth speakers list is Ultimate
Ears MEGABOOM 3. It’s among stylish loud outdoor Bluetooth speakers with
immersive 360-degree sound and deep thundering bass. Another best thing about
this portable speaker is it comes with a waterproof, dustproof, drop-proof,
durable and military-grade construction.

What’s more? This loud outdoor Bluetooth speaker features a magic button that
performs all the actions (play, pause, skip) with just one touch. Also, the
maximum sound level this BT speaker is capable of producing is 90 dba, and
that’s something making it truly a party starter. Overall, it’s another one in
the best outdoor Bluetooth speakers list that we have hunted for you, and you
will not regret buying.

###  **#6. Bose Soundlink Mini II**

 **Bose Soundlink Mini II outdoor Bluetooth speaker** looks small in size, but
when it comes to sound quality, it’s impressive. This outdoor Bluetooth
speaker sounds really great considering its size. It comes with powerful
custom-engineered drivers and sleekness of anodized aluminum.

What’s more? Voice prompts for easy Bluetooth pairing, up to 10-hour battery
life per charge, and built-in speakerphone are some of the cool and impressive
features of **Bose Soundlink Mini II outdoor Bluetooth speaker**. All in all,
it’s among the **best Bluetooth speaker for outdoor party** that we have
hunted for you, and we suggest you buy.

###  **#5. JBL Charge 3**

 **JBL Charge 3 outdoor Bluetooth speaker** is another speaker among the best
outdoor Bluetooth speakers in the list that support multiple smartphone
connections and up to 20 hours of playback time. The name itself defines the
quality of the product. It features noise and echoes resistive speakerphone so
that you enjoy crystal-clear voice calls.

 **JBL Charge 3** can connect up to 3 smartphones or tablets simultaneously
and delivers powerful stereo sound with no distortion at all. It comes
equipped with Lithium-ion Polymer (22.2Wh)2), offering up to 20 hours of
playtime. The playtime may vary depending on the volume (high, mid, or low).
It also comes with an IPX7 waterproofing rating, and that means you can take
it almost anywhere to enjoy the best quality sound.

Furthermore, one can also respond to incoming calls via **JBL Charge 3
Bluetooth speaker** with just a touch of a button. Also, thanks to its noise
and echo-canceling speakerphone, the voice during the call remains crystal
clear and soft. All in all, it’s another best Bluetooth speaker for outdoor
party to go with this year!

#  _ **How To Buy The Best Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers?| The Buying Guide**_

![How To Buy The Best Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers The Buying
Guide](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%201045%20696'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![How
To Buy The Best Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers The Buying
Guide](https://thekeenhunter.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/How-To-Buy-The-
Best-Outdoor-Bluetooth-Speakers-The-Buying-Guide-2-800x533.jpg)

Here we have listed all the facts and features that you should look for and
consider when buying the **best portable Bluetooth speakers** from the above
list. Have a look below to know all the facts and features you need yo look
for in [speakers](https://thekeenhunter.com/home-audio/best-soundbar-
speakers).

###  **![Best Outdoor Bluetooth
Speakers](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20299%20299'%3E%3C/svg%3E)![Best
Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers](https://thekeenhunter.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/Best-Outdoor-Bluetooth-Speakers-300x300.jpg)**

###  **Look For Application Support:**

Companion applications offer so many additional features to a Bluetooth
speaker that you can’t access using the physical buttons on the speaker
itself. A companion app can allow more than one person to be DJ, create a
playlist, and customize EQ curves for different
[music](https://thekeenhunter.com/home-electronics/best-bluetooth-fm-
transmitter) styles.

What’s more? The application can also help you to set wake up alarms, and
power On or Off your Bluetooth speaker remotely. So, application support is
one of the useful factors that we have considered while picking up the best
outdoor Bluetooth speakers for you.

###  **Look For aptX And aptX HD Support In Best Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers**

It’s necessary that the [Bluetooth
audio](https://thekeenhunter.com/computers/best-gaming-headsets) should be
squeezed to stream over airwaves, and the default codec uses lossy compression
that throws away some portions of the musical elements. [aptX by
Qualcomm](https://www.aptx.com/) is a lossless codec, so none of the musical
details get lost during the process. Also, it’s necessary that the aptX should
be present in both Bluetooth speaker and the playback device. Apple devices
don’t come with aptX codec, but most Android, some
[iPhones](https://thekeenhunter.com/electronics/best-lens-for-iphone) and
devices support aptX codec.

[Qualcomm aptX HD](https://www.aptx.com/aptx-hd) support HD audio files, but
sadly most of the outdoor Bluetooth speakers don’t support this codec. As with
its sibling, in order to work, aptX HD must be supported on both the playback
device and speaker.

## Battery Life Of The Best Waterproof Wireless Speakers ** ** ![Best
Waterproof Wireless
Speakers](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20502%20355'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Best Waterproof Wireless Speakers](https://thekeenhunter.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/Best-Waterproof-Wireless-Speakers-300x212.jpg) ****

What do you think is the most crucial feature of outdoor Bluetooth speakers?
Is it “Battery Life”? Yes! Generally, we expect Bluetooth speaker [battery to
last 12 to 20 hours](https://thekeenhunter.com/automotive/best-portable-power-
stations), but don’t forget that the bigger the battery, the heavier the
speaker will be. Overall, battery life plays a significant role while choosing
the best outdoor Bluetooth speakers.

###  **Consider The Charging Time**

If your Bluetooth speaker is equipped with a battery, you need to charge it.
Bluetooth speakers that support [USB
charging](https://thekeenhunter.com/computers/best-usb-c-hubs) are more
convenient than those supporting AC adaptors only.

Also, some speakers are there in the market that work as a [power
bank](https://thekeenhunter.com/electronics/best-pd-power-banks) and will
allow you to tap their battery to charge your smartphone using a USB cable.

###  **Accessories And Mounting Options**

Most importantly, a portable outdoor Bluetooth speaker must be easy to take
with you. Several outdoor Bluetooth speaker brands count on their overall size
to make them easy to grip; there are others that come with carabiner clips,
lanyard, and [shoulder ](https://thekeenhunter.com/health/best-neck-shoulder-
massagers)strap. Also, some manufacturers offer standardized sockets and
accessories so that user can even mount their speakers to an object.

###  **Speakerphone Feature Of B** **est Outdoor Speakers ![Best Outdoor
Speakers](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20419%20280'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Best Outdoor Speakers](https://thekeenhunter.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/Best-Outdoor-Speakers-300x200.jpg) **

Some speaker models feature built-in microphones. It allows users to use their
speaker as a speakerphone in concert with their smartphone. It also improves
sound quality, and you will find it much better than what you actually get
from your smartphone. Also, you will be able to [boost the
volume](https://thekeenhunter.com/computers/best-gaming-headsets) much higher.
So, It can be an excellent feature for those making conference calls with
their Bluetooth speakers.

###  **Stereo Pairing Feature Of B** **est Waterproof** **Wireless Speakers**

Stereo pairing is something that will allow you to create a [right/left
pairing with two speakers](https://thekeenhunter.com/home-audio/best-soundbar-
speakers). Of course, It works really best, and the sound will make you wow
with two identical speakers.

### Weatherization Of Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers ![Outdoor Bluetooth
Speakers](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20314%20209'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Outdoor Bluetooth Speakers](https://thekeenhunter.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/Outdoor-Bluetooth-Speakers-300x200.jpg)

Of course, your going to take your Bluetooth speaker to outdoor and
manufacturers actually consider this factor while manufacturing the outdoor
Bluetooth speakers. Manufacturers of best outdoor Bluetooth speakers always
try to provide an exceptional level of protection from outdoor environmental
elements.

Most of the reputed manufacturers provide [International Protection (IP)
Marking](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IP_Code) on their products so that
people can actually know the level of protection. The first digit of marking
stands for enclosure’s protection from particulate matter and the second digit
stands for protection rate against liquid. For example, a Bluetooth speaker
with marking IP64 indicates that Bluetooth is completely protected from dust
particles and liquid. The higher the marking number, the more protection you
expect.

###  **WiFi Connectivity ![Best Portable Bluetooth
Speakers](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20333%20222'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![Best Portable Bluetooth Speakers](https://thekeenhunter.com/wp-
content/uploads/2018/11/Best-Portable-Bluetooth-Speakers-300x200.jpg) **

If you’re buying higher priced outdoor Bluetooth speakers, then chances are
you will get [WiFi connectivity](https://thekeenhunter.com/electronics/best-
digital-photo-frames) feature. With this feature, you will be able to stream
music from your NAS Box. WiFi streams are known to offer the better fidelity
as compared to Bluetooth.

###  **Wireless Range Of B** **est Portable Bluetooth Speakers**

![The Best Portable Bluetooth Speakers connectivity
range](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20124%2070'%3E%3C/svg%3E)
![The Best Portable Bluetooth Speakers connectivity
range](https://thekeenhunter.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/The-Best-Portable-
Bluetooth-Speakers-300x169.jpg) The range of Bluetooth speakers depends on the
power class of radio used. The [wireless
range](https://thekeenhunter.com/computers/best-smart-wireless-routers-in-
budget-range-2019) can actually vary widely, and it also gets affected by the
environment it operates in. Generally, an outdoor Bluetooth speaker with Class
1 Radio offer range of approximately 100m. However, the walls between the
speaker and [Bluetooth ](https://thekeenhunter.com/home-electronics/best-
bluetooth-fm-transmitter)source, and also the materials of those walls will
have a considerable impact on the range of Bluetooth speaker.
